Name: digital_financial_literacy
Title: Evaluating Digital Banking's Effect on Financial Literacy Among Vulnerable Populations in Japan
Description: This study investigates the intersection of digital banking adoption and financial literacy among vulnerable populations in Japan, including the aging, rural communities, and those with lower socioeconomic status. The research will assess how digitalization in banking affects financial accessibility and literacy for these groups, who may face exclusion due to low digital literacy. Data will be collected through surveys and interviews focusing on digital banking usage and literacy challenges. The study aims to propose technology-based solutions and strategies for banks to enhance digital financial literacy and inclusivity, thereby improving service efficiency.
